Issue.creator: andkononykhin
Issue.summary: indy-crypto python wrapper debian package should depend on specific version of libindy-crypto
Issue.description: As of now debian package for python wrapper of indy-crypto is built without explicitly specified version of libinfy-crypto|https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-crypto/blob/640186b3f3b60ca3565bef1251a77233db208bfd/wrappers/python/ci/python-wrapper-deb-build-and-upload.sh#L33 . It might lead to run-time issues in future.
